post_text: May 13, 2015 at 3:12â€¯PM#1Hi,I've been using MA for a while but haven't really go into the pointy end of Macros.....I am basically looking to trigger an effect on a channel when that channel reaches a value given from an merge.Here is some Pseudo code which may or may not help....!Int i;For (i = 0; i < = 400) {If Current Channel < 65 {Next Channel}If Current Channel == 65 {Go Effect 1;i++;}}Jack
title: Any one fancy a crack at this.....?
